pageContent: Background: Whole-gland high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) has been used as salvage therapy for local recurrence following external beam radiation therapy for decades. This article describes the use of the Sonablate 500 HIFU system in the salvage setting.

metaData.source:
Oncological Outcome and Value of Postoperative Magnetic Resonance Imaging after Focal High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound Therapy for Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31466073/
